channel.title: Delegation on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Delegation on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 47: The Three Delegations
item.description: Margaret’s daughter Sarah called last Tuesday to tell her she’d “taken care of” the Medicare Advantage plan selection. Sarah had asked the AI to compare formularies against Margaret’s medication list, check which plans included Margaret’s cardiologist, evaluate the premium-to-deductible tradeoffs, and recommend the best option. Then she had it fill out the enrollment paperwork and submit it electronically.
